page.title: 05Playground Games at Longhope
page.content: The most popular, apart from Football, are{Poison, TreeTag or ShipShore.}In {Poison}one person shouts "Last one on the wall is on it for Poison". You run across and if you get tagged you are "on it". When all are caught you start again. {TreeTag}uses two bases, like our Netball Circles.Someone is "on it" then everyone starts in one circle. They try to run across to the other and if tagged they stand with legs apart and arms out like a tree. To free them someone must go through their legs or under their arms. {ShipShore.}Someone is "on it" and one wall is Ship the other Shore. The person on it shouts "Ship" or "Shore" or "Scrub the Decks" and the last one to do the action is out. When one person is left they are "on it".
